entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Outlook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:43 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Outlook 03:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.4°C
Wind: SSE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 03:18 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 03:18 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 03:18 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
